document_data.name: Halamther
document_data.occupation: High Hand in the [[Risen Cult of Bane]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Halamther''' was a [[wizard]] and one of seven High Hands in the [[Risen Cult of Bane]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|29-30}}<ref group="note" name="Year">[[Dragon magazine 362|''Dragon'' #362]] provides an exact date for the events of ''[[Halls of the High King]]'', which did not give an exact date within itself.
document_data.Activities: Halamther spent much of his time creating a variety of awful creatures to serve the Risen Cult of Bane. Out of all creatures he was known to mostly frequently create [[ju-ju zombie]]s.
document_data.Relationships: Halamther was a good friend of the cult's leader [[Gauntather]] for much of his life.
